cast.name: 布伦丹·奥卡罗尔 Brendan O'Carroll

writer.name: 布伦丹·奥卡罗尔 Brendan O'Carroll

this_title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: New Year Special 2018,CSI: Mammy
trans_title: 布朗夫人的儿子们2018新年特辑
introduction: Having persuaded Mark to let Bono attend his first disco, Agnes joins Winnie and Hilary on patrol for the Neighbourhood Watch scheme Maria and Father Damien have set up to combat the recent crime surge, though Buster actually hatches the plan to trap the thief; Cathy is annoyed when Agnes goes on a radio talk show to get her daughter a boyfriend and even more so by the unwanted admirers it brings her - until Grandad gets rid of them for her.
chinese_title: 布朗夫人的儿子们2018新年特辑
foreign_title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: New Year Special 2018,CSI: Mammy
